channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 美国将在联合国决议中呼吁加沙立即停火

US to call for immediate ceasefire in Gaza in UN resolution https://t.co/GtvUlC2MPf

— Financial Times (@FT) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在两天的大规模空袭之后，泽连斯基抨击乌克兰的西方伙伴未能提供军事援助。"俄罗斯的导弹没有延误，不像对我们国家的一揽子援助。沙赫特人没有优柔寡断，不像某些政客"。
item.description:
After 2 days of massive air strikes, Zelensky blasted Ukraine’s western partners over failure to provide military assistance. “There are no delays in Russian missiles, unlike aid packages to our state. Shaheds have no indecision, unlike some politicians.” https://t.co/pHbjYAoxcP

— Christopher Miller (@ChristopherJM) March 22, 2024

item.title: 安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）告诉《金融时报》，英国央行在未来的会议上 "有可能 "降息，因为有迹象表明，紧缩政策已经抑制了工资价格螺旋式上升的风险。
item.description:
'We have an increasingly positive story to tell.'

Andrew Bailey told the Financial Times that rate cuts were 'in play' at future meetings of the Bank of England amid signs that tighter policy had quelled the risk of a wage-price spiral. https://t.co/X3tECpcH4h pic.twitter.com/pwXEFNi1NW

— Financial Times (@FT) March 22, 2024

item.title: 周四，该公司股票在纽约证券交易所开始交易，股票代码为 RDDT，开盘价为 47 美元，远高于每股 34 美元的首次公开募股价格：
item.description:
The stock opened at $47 as trading began on Thursday at the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker RDDT, far above its IPO price of $34 a share: https://t.co/2Mzh0cUvVO pic.twitter.com/bFab1UQKAb

— Financial Times (@FT) March 21, 2024
